bibl.title: with the assistance of Adam GUTTERIDGE, Yuri MARANO and Lukas SCHACHNER, Recent Research on the Late Antique Countryside

bibl.seg: CHAVARRÍA Alexandra and Tamara LEWIT, Archaeological Research on the Late Antique Countryside: A Bibliographic Essay.

William BOWDEN, Luke LAVAN and Carlos MACHADO (Edd.), with the assistance of Adam GUTTERIDGE, Yuri MARANO and Lukas SCHACHNER, Recent Research on the Late Antique Countryside = Late Antique Archaeology. 2 (Leiden - Boston, 2004) pp. 5-51.

Introduction. - Sources. - Land-ownership, production and land-use, technology. - Settlement patterns and rural evolution in the East. - Settlement patterns and rural evolution in Africa. - Settlement patterns and rural evolution in the West. - The Christianization of the Late Antique landscape.
